Package controller

Class ReportsScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.ReportsScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ReportsScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is for showing various reports on the data in the database.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initialize determines the initial state of the scene when it gets called. For month and type count, the month and type combo boxes are populated with data. For appointments by contact table, the columns are
      assigned to which variable they will be storing for appointments. The table is populated from the database. For outdated appointments
      table, the columns are assigned to which variable they will be storing for appointments. The table is populated from the database.
      using a for loop and checking if the appointment ended before the current local date and time. If so, it is added to the table.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - points to a uniform resource locator (source: )
      resourceBundle - contains locale-specific objects (source: )

    • calcTotal

      public void calcTotal(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Calculates total appointments of a certain type during a specified month and displays it in a label.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when a selection is made from the type or month combo box.

    • selectContactAppointments

      public void selectContactAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets appointments in table based on contact selected from the contacts combo box. stores selected contact to the contact variable which is passed into the constructor of the overloaded getAllAppointments
      method. The returned appointments are stored in an observable list and set to the table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when a selection is made from the contacts combo box.

    • toMain

      public void toMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method sends users to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when cancel button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException
